title: Server Rules
description:
---

1. Treat everyone with respect. Absolutely no harassment, witch hunting, sexism, racism, or hate speech will be tolerated.

1. Do not send or link any harmful material such as viruses.

1.  Do not @everyone, @here or @ server staffs without a reason.

1.  No spam or self-promotion (server invites, advertisements, etc) outside the designated areas without permission from a staff member. This includes DMing fellow members.

1. Post content in the correct channels.

1. Don't post personal information without permission.

1. Listen to staff.

1. No NSFW or obscene content. This includes text, images, or links featuring nudity, sex, hard violence, or other graphically disturbing content.

1. No loud or disturbing noises in voice channels.

1. If you see something against the rules or something that makes you feel unsafe, let staff know. We want this server to be a welcoming space!
